item.title: Reversing an Array — Pure vs In-Place
item.description:
This article is based on an exercise from Eloquent JavaScript.
The task is to write two functions:

  • reverseArray(array) – returns a new array that has the elements in reverse order.
  • reverseArrayInPlace(array) – reverses the same array in place.

Explanation

For reverseArray, I decided not to change the original array.
Instead, I create a new empty array and loop over the input from the end to the beginning,
pushing each element into the new array. This makes the function pure (no side effects).
